attributes.action: abolish the present system of forced double payment of duty for Excise Goods received for own use by post, from within the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HM Revenue & Customs automatically assume that all Excise Goods received by post are for commercial use and are therefore dutiable. This means in reality that duty is paid twice on the items or the items are seized. A sensible personal allowance should be applicable via the post.
